author: cryptocraftsman
content: when we made a tranjaction on centralized exchange then this transjaction record is stored on blockchain or not. because in this case we don't have the private key?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: It's not, only transactions from and to an exchange are recorded on the blockchain and this channel is not the right channel to ask such question.

author: chfast
content: Will EIP-4399 go in The Merge or next HF?

author: chfast
content: Shouldn't it be in Review state at least?

author: djrtwo
content: yes, the "security considerations" are being extended today/tomorrow and shifted to review

author: timbeiko
content: Yes, both that one and 3675 should be moved. It's fine if there are changes to the EIP when it's in review btw, you just don't expect it to change significantly. For past upgrades, we've moved EIPs to Review once they were formally accepted into the upgrade (then Last Call slated for testnets, and Final when on mainnet)
